contentrichtext.text: The '''Oak Park Elementary School District''' operates eight [[Primary education|elementary school]]s (K-5, unless otherwise noted) and two [[middle school]]s (6-8) in [[Oak Park, Illinois]], [[United States|USA]]. The district has 376 teachers ([[full-time equivalent|FTE]]s) serving 4,923 students. {| border="1" |+ '''School Facts''' ! School Name ! Students ! FTE Teachers !
